div.p: No. 2610, p. 777a, unit 70, VPRS 1187/P, outward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office of Victoria.
Document is a circular to the heads of 12 departments within the Chief Secretary's Department, with the head's title filled in as appropriate in each case. Chief Secretary's Office

Referring to my letter of the 26th ultimo
See T. Wilson to M, 26 June 1885 (in this edition as 85-06-26a). in which information was requested respecting the increase in the Estimates of 1885/6 over those of 1884/5 from certain specified causes, I have now to request that I may be further informed of the increase which arises from the increments to which officers have become entitled for the year 1885/6.
